abstract: Good food and drink rank high among Hong Kongers' obsessions, so it's appropriate that there is a whole month devoted to it.
snippet: Good food and drink rank high among Hong Kongers' obsessions, so it's appropriate that there is a whole month devoted to it.
lead_paragraph: Good food and drink rank high among Hong Kongers' obsessions, so it's appropriate that there is a whole month devoted to it. Wine & Dine month kicks off with the Wine & Dine Festival, which runs Oct. 27 to 30 at a picturesque location on the West Kowloon promenade. Food and wine tastings may be purchased from over 200 exhibitors (general admission is free). New at the festival this year are Spanish and Japanese purveyors who promise themed food and entertainment.

headline.main: In Hong Kong, a Monthlong Celebration of Food and Wine
